means: 不喜欢出门的，不喜欢离家的
不爱出门的人，不爱离家的人

sentence.Network_en: I had to postpone ideas of a career and stay at home.
sentence.Network_cn: 我不得不暂缓就业打算，呆在家里。

sentence.Network_en: The Bishop directed the faithful to stay at home.
sentence.Network_cn: 主教要求信徒们呆在家中。

sentence.Network_en: I'd better skip the party and stay at home to revise.
sentence.Network_cn: 我最好还是不去参加这个聚会，留在家里温习功课。

entry.tran: (不去工作或旅行)守在家里的人
entry.def: If you describe someone as a stay-at-home, you mean that they stay at home rather than going out to work or travelling.

example.ex: I was a stay-at-home mum until 1980 when my husband lost his job.
example.tran: 1980 年我丈夫失业之前，我一直是个家庭主妇。

means.word_mean: 1. a person who seldom goes anywhere; one not given to wandering or travel

auth_sentence.content: But critics told the audience to stay at home.
